result.markdown:
---
title: "Masa para Pizza"
author: "Miguel Equihua"
draft: TRUE
date: "2023-02-06"
output: html_document
---




## Exploración tabular de los datos


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
masa <- read_csv("masa-para-pizza.txt", col_names = TRUE)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
Rows: 16 Columns: 2
── Column specification ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
Delimiter: ","
chr (1): receta
dbl (1): tiempo

ℹ Use `spec()` to retrieve the full column specification for this data.
ℹ Specify the column types or set `show_col_types = FALSE` to quiet this message.
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
masa %>% mutate(receta = factor(receta)) -> masa

masa %>% group_by(receta) %>% 
         summarise(media = median(tiempo, na.rm = TRUE), 
                   mediana = median(tiempo, na.rm = TRUE),
                   var = var(tiempo))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
# A tibble: 4 × 4
  receta media mediana   var
  <fct>  <dbl>   <dbl> <dbl>
1 A       488.    488. 6340.
2 B       192.    192. 4490.
3 C       675     675  5491.
4 D       175     175  2723.
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
masa <- masa[order(masa$receta),]
```
:::


## Exploración gráfica


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
plot(masa$tiempo, type = "n", ylab = "tiempo")
text(masa$tiempo, labels = masa$receta)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](masa-pizza_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-2-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
masa_lm <- lm(tiempo ~ receta, data = masa)
summary(masa_lm)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

Call:
lm(formula = tiempo ~ receta, data = masa)

Residuals:
     Min       1Q   Median       3Q      Max 
-102.000  -39.375    3.875   49.000   88.750 

Coefficients:
            Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|)    
(Intercept)   486.25      34.50  14.095 7.90e-09 ***
recetaB      -290.00      48.79  -5.944 6.78e-05 ***
recetaC       169.75      48.79   3.479  0.00455 ** 
recetaD      -302.50      48.79  -6.200 4.59e-05 ***
---
Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1

Residual standard error: 69 on 12 degrees of freedom
Multiple R-squared:  0.9179,	Adjusted R-squared:  0.8974 
F-statistic: 44.74 on 3 and 12 DF,  p-value: 8.64e-07
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
plot(masa_lm)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](masa-pizza_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){width=672}
:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](masa-pizza_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-2.png){width=672}
:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](masa-pizza_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-3.png){width=672}
:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](masa-pizza_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-4.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
confint(masa_lm, level = 0.95)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
                 2.5 %    97.5 %
(Intercept)  411.08342  561.4166
recetaB     -396.30159 -183.6984
recetaC       63.44841  276.0516
recetaD     -408.80159 -196.1984
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
masa$receta_ABD <- recode(masa$receta, A = "ABD", B ="ABD", D = "ABD")
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
masa_lm_ABD <- lm(tiempo ~ receta_ABD, data = masa)
summary(masa_lm_ABD)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

Call:
lm(formula = tiempo ~ receta_ABD, data = masa)

Residuals:
    Min      1Q  Median      3Q     Max 
-168.75 -104.94  -23.75   74.56  286.25 

Coefficients:
            Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|)    
(Intercept)   288.75      41.65   6.932 6.96e-06 ***
receta_ABDC   367.25      83.31   4.408 0.000595 ***
---
Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1

Residual standard error: 144.3 on 14 degrees of freedom
Multiple R-squared:  0.5813,	Adjusted R-squared:  0.5514 
F-statistic: 19.43 on 1 and 14 DF,  p-value: 0.0005951
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
plot(masa_lm_ABD)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](masa-pizza_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-8-1.png){width=672}
:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](masa-pizza_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-8-2.png){width=672}
:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](masa-pizza_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-8-3.png){width=672}
:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](masa-pizza_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-8-4.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
# Modelo ponderado para enfrentarnos a la heterocedasticidad
# Defino los ponderadores a usar
wt <- 1 / lm(abs(masa_lm_ABD$residuals) ~ masa_lm_ABD$fitted.values)$fitted.values^2
wt
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
           1            2            3            4            5            6 
5.768306e-05 5.768306e-05 5.768306e-05 5.768306e-05 5.768306e-05 5.768306e-05 
           7            8            9           10           11           12 
5.768306e-05 5.768306e-05 3.429355e-04 3.429355e-04 3.429355e-04 3.429355e-04 
          13           14           15           16 
5.768306e-05 5.768306e-05 5.768306e-05 5.768306e-05 
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# Ajusto un modelo ponderado con mayor peso los tratamientos con menor varianza
masa_lm_ABD_pond <- lm(tiempo ~ receta_ABD, data = masa, weights = wt)
summary(masa_lm_ABD_pond)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

Call:
lm(formula = tiempo ~ receta_ABD, data = masa, weights = wt)

Weighted Residuals:
    Min      1Q  Median      3Q     Max 
-1.8889 -0.9114 -0.2027  0.9074  2.1740 

Coefficients:
            Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|)    
(Intercept)   288.75      47.12   6.129 2.61e-05 ***
receta_ABDC   367.25      57.79   6.355 1.78e-05 ***
---
Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1

Residual standard error: 1.24 on 14 degrees of freedom
Multiple R-squared:  0.7426,	Adjusted R-squared:  0.7242 
F-statistic: 40.38 on 1 and 14 DF,  p-value: 1.785e-05
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
plot((masa_lm_ABD_pond))
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](masa-pizza_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-9-1.png){width=672}
:::

:::

![](masa-pizza_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-9-3.png){width=672}
:::
